Headline: #81Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near  Lakeshore Drive/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound #81Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson and Marine Drive, due to police activity near Lakeshore Drive/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson and Marine Drive, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Lakeshore Drive/Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan, #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express, #147 Outer Drive Express, #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near Wacker/Michigan
ShortDescription: #151 Sheridan, #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express, #147 Outer Drive Express, #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Wacker/Michigan

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan, #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express, #147 Outer Drive Express, #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Wacker/Michigan, due to police activity.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, Clark, and Wacker, the resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, Dearborn and Chicago, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
